results.name: Characteristic function of partition numbers.
link: Reinhard Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
mathematica: (* nmax=14 gives P(nmax)+1 = 136 terms; nmax=33 gives 10144 terms *)
program: (PARI) a(n) = {k=0; while ((pk=numbpart(k)) != n, if (pk > n, return(0)); k++); return (1);} \\ _Michel Marcus_, Nov 03 2015
xref: For n >= 1, column 1 of A186114, also right border of A193870. - _Omar E. Pol_, Aug 14 2011
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Nov 03 2009
